trans-unit.source: “MQTT” is a trademark of the OASIS open standards consortium, which publishes the MQTT specifications.
trans-unit.target: “ MQTT”是OASIS开放标准联盟的商标，该联盟发布了MQTT规范。

trans-unit.source: mqttwarn is currently undergoing some refurbishment and will also be ported to Python 3 during that phase. You are welcome to participate!
trans-unit.target: mqttwarn目前正在进行一些翻新，并且在此阶段还将移植到Python 3。欢迎您参加！

trans-unit.source: mqttwarn subscribes to any number of MQTT topics and publishes received payloads to one or more notification services after optionally applying sophisticated transformations.
trans-unit.target: mqttwarn订阅任意数量的MQTT主题，并在可选地应用复杂的转换之后将接收到的有效负载发布到一个或多个通知服务。

trans-unit.source: A more detailed blog post about what mqttwarn can be used for is available at https://jpmens.net/2014/04/03/how-do-your-servers-talk-to-you/.
trans-unit.target: 有关mqttwarn可以用作什么的更详细的博客文章，网址为https://jpmens.net/2014/04/03/how-do-your-servers-talk-to-you/。

trans-unit.source: A picture says a thousand words.
trans-unit.target: 一幅画能说明千言万语。

trans-unit.target: 关于我们

trans-unit.target: 鸣谢

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, have a look at mqttwarn.service, the systemd unit configuration file for mqttwarn.
trans-unit.target: 另外，看看mqttwarn.service，为systemd单元配置文件mqttwarn。

trans-unit.source: An MQTT broker. We recommend Mosquitto.
trans-unit.target: MQTT经纪人。我们推荐Mosquitto。

trans-unit.source: First, create configuration and custom Python starter files
trans-unit.target: 首先,创建配置和自定义Python启动文件

trans-unit.source: For hacking on mqttwarn, please install it in development mode.
trans-unit.target: 要在mqttwarn上进行黑客入侵，请以开发模式安装。

trans-unit.source: For debugging or other purposes, you might want to directly run a notification plugin without the dispatching and transformation machinery of mqttwarn. We have you covered, just try this to launch the plugin standalone by passing essential information using JSON:
trans-unit.target: 为了调试或其他目的，您可能希望直接运行通知插件，而无需使用mqttwarn的调度和转换机制。我们已经介绍了您，只需尝试使用JSON传递基本信息即可独立启动插件：

trans-unit.source: For example, you may wish to submit an alarm published as text to the MQTT topic
trans-unit.target: 例如,您可能希望将以文本形式发布的警报提交给 MQTT 主题。

trans-unit.source: Have fun!
trans-unit.target: 玩得开心点

trans-unit.source: If you encounter any problems during setup or operations or if you have further suggestions, please let us know by opening an issue on GitHub. Thanks already.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在设置或操作过程中遇到任何问题，或者还有其他建议，请在GitHub上打开问题以告知我们。谢谢了

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介紹

trans-unit.source: It comes with over 70 notification handler plugins for a wide range of notification services and is very open to further contributions. You can enjoy the alphabetical list of plugins within the handbook.
trans-unit.target: 它带有70多个通知处理程序插件，可用于各种通知服务，并且对进一步的贡献非常开放。您可以在手册中享受按字母顺序排列的插件列表。

trans-unit.source: It is and will always be free and open source software.
trans-unit.target: 它是并且将永远是免费的开源软件。

trans-unit.source: Just launch
trans-unit.target: 只要启动

trans-unit.source: Legal stuff
trans-unit.target: 法律方面

trans-unit.source: Licenses
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Miscellaneous
trans-unit.target: 杂项

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: 笔记

trans-unit.source: Notifications are transmitted to the appropriate service via plugins. mqttwarn provides built-in plugins for a number of services and you can easily add your own.
trans-unit.target: 通知通过插件传输到适当的服务。 mqttwarn为许多服务提供了内置插件，您可以轻松添加自己的插件。

trans-unit.source: Please note this feature is a work in progress, so expect there to be dragons.
trans-unit.target: 请注意此功能正在进行中,所以预计会有龙。

trans-unit.source: Press
trans-unit.target: 媒体

trans-unit.source: Project information
trans-unit.target: 项目信息

trans-unit.source: Python. The program should work on Python 2, Python 3 and PyPy.
trans-unit.target: Python。该程序应该在Python 2、Python 3和PyPy上工作。

trans-unit.target: 所需经费

trans-unit.target: 作为系统守护进程运行

trans-unit.target: 运行通知插件

trans-unit.source: So, if you’d like to contribute you’re most welcome. Spend some time taking a look around, locate a bug, design issue or spelling mistake and then send us a pull request or create an issue.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您愿意捐款，我们将非常欢迎。花一些时间环顾四周，查找错误，设计问题或拼写错误，然后向我们发送请求请求或创建问题。

trans-unit.source: Some more Python modules to satisfy service dependencies defined in the
trans-unit.target: 中定义的一些Python模块来满足服务依赖。

trans-unit.source: Synopsis:
trans-unit.target: 简介:

trans-unit.source: Thanks in advance for your efforts, we really appreciate any help or feedback.
trans-unit.target: 提前感谢您的努力,我们真的很感谢您的帮助和反馈。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to all the contributors of mqttwarn who got their hands dirty with it and helped to co-create and conceive it in one way or another. You know who you are.
trans-unit.target: 感谢mqttwarn的所有贡献者，他们把它弄脏了手，并以一种或另一种方式共同创建和构思了它。你知道你是谁。

trans-unit.source: The handbook is the right place to read all about mqttwarn’s features and service plugins.
trans-unit.target: 该手册是阅读mqttwarn的所有功能和服务插件的正确位置。

trans-unit.source: The article MQTTwarn: Ein Rundum-Sorglos-Notifier in German at JAXenter.
trans-unit.target: JAXenter上的德语文章“ MQTTwarn：Ein Rundum-Sorglos-Notifier”。

trans-unit.source: The folks of the Berlin-based beekeeper collective Hiveeyes are monitoring their beehives and use mqttwarn as a building block for their alert notification system, enjoy reading Schwarmalarm using mqttwarn.
trans-unit.target: 总部位于柏林的养蜂人团体Hiveeyes的人们正在监视他们的蜂箱，并使用mqttwarn 作为其警报通知系统的基础，并喜欢使用mqttwarn阅读Schwarmalarm。

trans-unit.source: These links will guide you to the source code of mqttwarn and its documentation.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接将指导您访问mqttwarn的源代码及其文档。

trans-unit.source: This program subscribes to any number of MQTT topics (which may include wildcards) and publishes received payloads to one or more notification services, including support for notifying more than one distinct service for the same message.
trans-unit.target: 该程序订阅任何数量的MQTT主题(可能包括通配符),并将收到的有效载荷发布到一个或多个通知服务,包括支持为同一消息通知多个不同的服务。

trans-unit.source: This software is copyright © 2014-2019 Jan-Piet Mens and contributors. All rights reserved.
trans-unit.target: 该软件的版权©2014-2019 Jan-Piet Mens和贡献者。版权所有。

trans-unit.source: To warn, alert, or notify.
trans-unit.target: 为了警告，警告或通知。

trans-unit.source: To supply a different configuration file or log file, optionally use:
trans-unit.target: 要提供不同的配置文件或日志文件,可选择使用。

trans-unit.target: 疑难解答

trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Use of the source code included here is governed by the Eclipse Public License 2.0, see LICENSE file for details. Please also recognize the licenses of third-party components.
trans-unit.target: 此处包含的源代码的使用受Eclipse Public License 2.0的约束， 有关详细信息，请参阅LICENSE文件。还请承认第三方组件的许可证。

trans-unit.source: We are always happy to receive code contributions, ideas, suggestions and problem reports from the community.
trans-unit.target: 我们总是乐于接受来自社区的代码贡献、想法、建议和问题报告。

trans-unit.source: We outlined the tasks for the next releases within the backlog. They might be transferred into GitHub issues progressively, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: 我们在积压工作中概述了下一个发行版的任务。如果适用，它们可能会逐步转移到GitHub问题中。

trans-unit.source: We recommend to use Supervisor for running mqttwarn as a service, see also supervisor.ini.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用Supervisor将mqttwarn作为服务运行，另请参见supervisor.ini。

trans-unit.source: You can also add support for a specific service plugin:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以为特定的服务插件添加支持。

trans-unit.source: You can also add support for multiple services, all at once:
trans-unit.target: 您还可以同时添加对多个服务的支持。
